body.p: It is with great anticipation that we launch the new year with our first issue under the SAGE banner. The opportunity to reach new audiences, engage new authors and build strategic alliances beyond the traditional boundaries of the foresight community is an exciting one. We expect that the transition will be a seamless one for readers, and we will continue the pattern established in 2012 of three regular sized issues and one larger issue that doubles as the annual WFS conference volume. This was well received at the Toronto conference and we all feel sure that World Future 2013: Exploring the Next Horizon will produce an even better issue. So if you have an article you have been waiting for an opportunity to send—now is the time!
